forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine this morning. Becoming mostly cloudy with showers developing this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 16C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly sunny early. Increasing clouds with showers this afternoon. Thunder possible. High 64F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible early. Partly cloudy. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible early. Partly cloudy skies. Low 39F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of clouds and sun in the morning followed by cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 19C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 69F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low 42F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High around 15C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 62F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 4C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with clearing later at night. Low around 40F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. Thunder possible. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. Thunder possible. High 52F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...remaining cloudy with snow showers late. Thunder possible. Low 2C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Evening rain followed by a mix of rain and snow showers late. Thunder possible. Low 37F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 9C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High around 50F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening transitioning to snow showers late. Low 3C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 39F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning becoming a steady light rain in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy. Periods of light rain early. Low 3C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with occasional light rain...mainly in the evening. Low 39F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High near 15C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 4C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds early will give way to generally clear conditions overnight. Low 41F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 19C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 68F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear skies. Low near 5C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 42F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 21C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 72F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low around 5C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A mostly clear sky. Low 43F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny, along with a few afternoon clouds. High near 20C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and some clouds. High 71F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds from time to time. Low 6C. Winds SE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 44F. Winds SE at 5 to 10 mph.
